UAInboxMessageListDelegate Protocol Reference

Conforms to NSObject
Declared in UAInboxMessageListDelegate.h

Overview

The UAInboxMessageListDelegate protocol declares methods that are implemented by delegates of a UAInboxMessageList API calls.

Delegates are notified when messages are modified, loaded or fail to load or update.

  • – messageListLoadSucceeded
